pages.text: Surf through the site of the goddamn cool, smart and handsome students of 8-STA. See, the memories and history of Batch S' 8-STA. Welcome to our page, classmates and batchmates where we highlight our batch events, trips and the fun times in our campus. And as David Andal said: "Orayt!!! Rock n' Roll to the world!"
pages.title: About

pages.text: Image by Mr. Raniel Mata Congratulations to all Officers who won the elections for SY 2015-2016!!!
